Package TorNATO.dev

Class Main

java.lang.Object
TorNATO.dev.Main
public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
A main method for my Scrabble program. Basically, what this program allows you to do is look up if a given word is a valid scrabble word, or cheat based on the current characters that you hold in your deck!
Since:
2020-12-30
Version:
0.1
Author:
Nathan Waltz

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method
      Parameters:

    • readDictionary

      public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Word> readDictionary​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      readDictionary method: Takes in a filename and reads the words quickly using a BufferedReader, and afterwards stores the words in a dictionary for O(1) access time
      Parameters:
      filename - A filename which contains the path to the dictionary
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing a dictionary which consists of the word as a String and the corresponding Word object
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If something goes wrong with reading the file, it throws this exception

    • readCharacterValues

      public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​java.lang.Integer> readCharacterValues​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      readDictionary method: Takes in a filename and reads the characters quickly using a BufferedReader, and afterwards stores the words in a dictionary for O(1) access time
      Parameters:
      filename - A filename which contains the path to the dictionary
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing a dictionary which consists of a character as well as score of that character
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If something goes wrong with reading the file, it throws this exception

    • cheat

      public static void cheat​(java.util.Scanner userIn)
      Cheat method: Allows the user to cheat given a sequence of characters
      Parameters:
      userIn - A scanner parameter which allows for the user to enter a character sequence

    • lookup

      public static void lookup​(java.util.Scanner userIn)
      Lookup method: Allows the user to see if a given String exists
      Parameters:
      userIn - A scanner parameter which allows for the user to enter a word

    • genSubsets

      public static java.util.Set<Word> genSubsets​(char[] word)
      Generates a "power set" of characters from a given character array
      Parameters:
      word - A character array which contains characters for which we wish to find a subset
      Returns:
      A "power set" of all the characters that are contained in the passed word character array

    • score

      public static int score​(java.lang.String word)
      Finds a score for a given word
      Parameters:
      word - A word passed by the client
      Returns:
      A score corresponding to the cumulative score of that word
